title: Write Off Bad Debt
description: An accountant needs to write off an accounts receivable balance for a customer who has gone bankrupt.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the list of unpaid invoices for the bankrupt customer.

tasks.description: Verify the bankruptcy status with supporting documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the bankruptcy notice and confirms the debt is uncollectible.

tasks.description: Create a journal entry to write off the outstanding balance to the bad debt expense account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent posts the correct journal entry to remove the receivable and record the expense.
